T07vabhdilu:5: taṃ satpathajñaṃ praṇipatya buddhaṃ śāstraṃ kariṣyāmyabhidharmadīpam // [1] //
T07vabhdilu:34: nabhaḥ khalu nabho dhātorāsanno hetureṣa tu /
T07vabhdilu:63: na śubhaṃ nāpi ca kliṣṭaṃ dvitīyādiṣu darśakam // [26] //
T07vabhdilu:83: spṛśyaṃ dvidhā sadharmāṃśāḥ saha tā nava bhautikāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:84: daśa sāvayavā mūrtāḥ ta eva daśa saṃcitāḥ // [36] //
T07vabhdilu:99: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau prathamasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:109: na hyū rdhvaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāyo na rūpaṃ nākṣijaṃ manaḥ /
T07vabhdilu:110: vijñānasya tu netrārthastau ca kāyasya savaṃtaḥ // [48] //
T07vabhdilu:111: nopariṣṭācchru teḥ kāyo na śabdo na svakaṃ manaḥ /
T07vabhdilu:112: vijñānasya tu nihrādastau ca kāyasya sarvataḥ // [49] //
T07vabhdilu:146: tadā saṃyojanaṃ tvāryaḥ paryādatte na kiñcanā // [63] //
T07vabhdilu:149: na tu saṃyojanaṃ kiñcitparyādatte tadā hyasau /
T07vabhdilu:158: ābhāsvarācca vairāgyaṃ yāti hanti tu nāsravān // [69] //
T07vabhdilu:160: śubhakṛtsnācca vairāgyaṃ yāti kleśānna hanti tu // [70] //
T07vabhdilu:161: dvivijñeyāḥ guṇāḥ pañca hetuḥ sarve kṣarākṣarāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:170: nāmnā dvāviṃśatistāni dravyato daśa sapta ca /
T07vabhdilu:194: śraddhādīnāṃ vidāṃ caiva doṣaḥ śuddhau malodaye /
T07vabhdilu:203: kāyasya bādhanaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ tu cetasaḥ /
T07vabhdilu:204: sukhaṃ ca sumanastā ca sātaṃ śārīramānasam // [86] //
T07vabhdilu:213: anyaiḥ ṣaṭ sapta vāṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpe antye tu jīvitam // [90] //
T07vabhdilu:216: daśāṣṭau nava catvāri kāme pañca śubhāni vā // [91] //
T07vabhdilu:217: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:242: samyaktvaniyatā ye tu ye ca śraddhādhimuktikāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:260: cittaṃ caitasikaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ tu svalakṣaṇaiḥ // [111] //
T07vabhdilu:261: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau dvitīyasya [adhyāyasya] dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:268: kliṣṭe ṣaṭ aśubhe tu dve āhrīkyamanapatrapā // [114] //
T07vabhdilu:304: ādilābhe saha prākca tadūrdhvaṃ vā tridheṣyate // [131] //
T07vabhdilu:305: kliṣṭāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ ca tadanyeṣāṃ tridhā matā /
T07vabhdilu:331: svarūpaṃ vedayaṃścchabdo vyañjanā dīni ca dhruvam /
T07vabhdilu:339: na śrutyā śrūyate śabdastadanyā ca gatiḥ śruteḥ /
T07vabhdilu:360: abhidharmadīpe [vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya ca]turthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:366: kāyikaṃ vāṅmayaṃ caiva cetanākhyaṃ ca mānasam /
T07vabhdilu:387: etānyo yāti śaraṇaṃ sa yāti śaraṇatrayam // [163] //
T07vabhdilu:403: bhūsaṃcāreṇa hānyā ca tyajyate dhyānajaṃ śubham // [170] //
T07vabhdilu:418: adho 'pi madhyamaṃ karma dhyānenā ntyepi nirvṛteḥ /
T07vabhdilu:427: satkṣetre kriyate yacca phalaṃ tasya niyamyate // [181] //
T07vabhdilu:439: navame cetanā yā tu sā kṛṣṇākṛṣṇayā [ghā]tinī /
T07vabhdilu:457: prāṇinaścātha bhogāśca nāmarūpaṃ ca nāma ca // [194] //
T07vabhdilu:487: phalaṃ śubhasya catvāri dvetrīṇi ca śubhādayaḥ // [207] //
T07vabhdilu:488: śubhādyāstvaśubhasya dve trīṇi catvāri ca kramāt /
T07vabhdilu:489: avyākṛtasya te tu dve trīṇi trīṇi śubhādayaḥ // [208] //
T07vabhdilu:494: ekaṃ trīṇi dvayaṃ caiva śaikṣādyāḥ paścimasya tu /
T07vabhdilu:495: dve dve pañca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dṛggheyasya tu karmaṇaḥ // [211] //
T07vabhdilu:496: trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛṣṭiheyādayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:497: te tvabhyāsapraheyasya dve catvāri tridhā matāḥ // [212] //
T07vabhdilu:503: karttṛtā bhoktṛtā coktā niṣiddhā śāśvatasya tu // [215] //
T07vabhdilu:520: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau caturthasyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:531: dviṣatāmapi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā manaḥ sadyaḥ prasīdati // [227] //
T07vabhdilu:537: buddhotpāde naraḥ strī vā tadādyaṃ cittamaśnute // [229] //
T07vabhdilu:619: bhavāgre kṣāntiheyā ye dṛggheyā eva te matāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:621: ahaṃ mameti yā dṛṣṭirasau satkāyadṛk smṛtā /
T07vabhdilu:642: dravyato daśa caikaśca nāmnā sapta tu te matāḥ /
T07vabhdilu:668: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:675: avidyā dhīśca tṛṣṇā ca na kāṅkṣāmānadṛṣṭayaḥ // [291] //
T07vabhdilu:695: ebhyo yaḥ prathamo vādī bhajate sādhutāmalau /
T07vabhdilu:725: vada somya kathaṃ yāti pratītyā vastu vastutām // [313] //
T07vabhdilu:739: ko vighnaḥ aṅgavaikalyam na tatsarvāstitā sadā /
T07vabhdilu:740: tatkathaṃ śrūyatāṃ sadbhyaḥ durbodhā khalu dharmatā // [320] //
T07vabhdilu:746: tathā śaktistathā velā tathā sattā tathā kriyā // [323] //
T07vabhdilu:752: dharmāḥ pañcadhā nirmalāścaiva vijñānāni tathaiva ca // [326] //
T07vabhdilu:766: catvāraḥ parivṛtte sve rūpāptāḥ khalvapi trayaḥ /
T07vabhdilu:773: rūpāpte prathame 'dhastāt trayaḥ sve khalvapi trayaḥ // [336] //
T07vabhdilu:795: duḥkhendriye tu kāmāptaḥ svaireva saha sarvagaiḥ /
T07vabhdilu:809: bhavatyanantaraṃ ṣaḍ vā tasyodardhvaṃ pañca pañca vā // [353] //
T07vabhdilu:811: ekaṃ vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā sapta vā yadi vā daśa // [354] //
T07vabhdilu:823: abhidharmadīpe vibhāṣāprabhāyāṃ vṛttau pañcamasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
T07vabhdilu:825: vyavidyāḥ sakalāḥ kleśāḥ kāme kāmāsravo mataḥ /
T07vabhdilu:878: dvābhyāṃ māyā tathā śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣo middhaṃ tathaiva ca // [381] //
